Metadata: Pleasure Boating in Oregon: 1978 Statewide Boating Survey
Oregon State University Sea Grant College Program, School of Oceanography

A report to the Oregon State Marine Board, Brad Morris (Director). This survey was conducted in compliance with Oregon Revised Statute 488.833. The purpose was to determine the type, location and volume of boating activity within Oregon during the 1977-1978 boating season.
